casebody.data:
RIBELIN
v.
CREEL. No. 112A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 27, 2016. Robert L. Inge, Salisbury, for Creel, Phillip Ray. Phillip Creel, for Creel, Phillip Ray. Arlaine Rockey, Marshall, for Ribelin, Dana Marie (fka Creel). Kip David Nelson, Greensboro, for Creel, Phillip Ray.

*471The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of January 2016 by Plaintiff for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of January 2016."
